pr_title: Do not block rendering of Manage Jenkins while waiting for UC data

timeline.message: Do not block rendering of Manage Jenkins while waiting for UC data
Do not force parsing of UC data to determine deprecation status

timeline.bodyText: This line triggers a NPE when PluginDeprecationMonitor#isActivated is called. I've faced this on a support-core test, but I think it could be triggered as well if the  PluginDeprecationMonitor is enabled.
timeline.author: MRamonLeon

replies.bodyText: The previous comment refers to JENKINS-63562.
replies.author: daniel-beck
